compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\final\\e-learning-platform\\backend\.serviceRawFile:
service: elearning-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.10
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    RDS_ENDPOINT: "elearning-db.cwn4cmackagl.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com"
    S3_BUCKET: "elearning-archivos"
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: Allow
      Action:
        - s3:GetObject
        - s3:PutObject
        - s3:DeleteObject
      Resource: "arn:aws:s3:::elearning-archivos/*"

functions:
  api:
    handler: lambda_function.lambda_handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors:
            origin: "https://emprendimiento-narino.com"
            headers:
              - Content-Type
              - Authorization
              - X-Requested-With
              - Accept
              - Origin
            allowCredentials: true
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
          cors:
            origin: "https://emprendimiento-narino.com"
            headers:
              - Content-Type
              - Authorization
              - X-Requested-With
              - Accept
              - Origin
            allowCredentials: true

plugins:
  - serverless-wsgi
  - serverless-python-requirements

custom:
  wsgi:
    app: lambda_function.app
  pythonRequirements:
    dockerizePip: true

compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
